concept.definition: To communicate with a participant in some way
To consume food of a specified nature
To consume/receive a drug or other product
To meet with the patient (in-patient, out-patient, etc.)
To capture information about a patient (vitals, labs, etc.)
To modify the patient in some way (surgery, physiotherapy, education, counseling, etc.)
To refer the patient to receive some service
To provide something to the patient (medication, medical supply, etc.)
To receive a particular vision correction device

description: High-level categorization of the type of activity in a protocol.
name: ActivityDefinitionCategory

text.div:
ActivityDefinitionCategory

High-level categorization of the type of activity in a protocol.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/activity-definition-category defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
communication CommunicationTo communicate with a participant in some way
device DeviceTo use a specific device
diagnostic DiagnosticTo perform a particular diagnostic
diet DietTo consume food of a specified nature
drug DrugTo consume/receive a drug or other product
encounter EncounterTo meet with the patient (in-patient, out-patient, etc.)
immunization ImmunizationTo administer a particular immunization
observation ObservationTo capture information about a patient (vitals, labs, etc.)
procedure ProcedureTo modify the patient in some way (surgery, physiotherapy, education, counseling, etc.)
referral ReferralTo refer the patient to receive some service
supply SupplyTo provide something to the patient (medication, medical supply, etc.)
vision VisionTo receive a particular vision correction device
other OtherSome other form of action
